summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3875 for the improvement of the alley in Block 42, S. A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley between Terry Avenue and Boren Avenue, from Howell Street to Stewart Street, by grading and paving the same; under Ordinance No. 47335, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
